original_text: The Lord said to Satan, “From where have you come?” Satan answered the Lord and said, “From going to and fro on the earth, and from walking up and down on it.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 사탄에게 이르시되 네가 어디서 왔느냐 사탄이 여호와께 대답하여 이르되 땅을 두루 돌아 여기저기 다녀왔나이다

sentences.original_text: Satan answered the Lord and said,
“From going to and fro on the earth,
and from walking up and down on it.”
